availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hezekiah Alexander Jr. (Meade County, Kentucky, resident. )

body.p: Meade County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Hezekiah Alexander and Sophia Alexander. Resident of Meade County in 1850. Resident of Meade County in 1860. Convicted of attempted burglary in Meade County in 1860. Inmate in the Kentucky State Penitentiary in Frankfort in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, Kentucky District, p. 343.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, p. 86.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 10632.
KYR-0001-020-0151.
